Judul: PENGEMBANGAN DESAIN INTERAKSI APLIKASI PEMBELAJARAN DARING BERFOKUS FORUM DAN CHAT DENGAN PENDEKATAN GOAL-DIRECTED DESIGN
Abstrak:
Online learning are activities carried out with the help of internet technology.
Since 2020, due to the Covid-19 pandemic, educational activities must be done
online which were required online learning application. However, online learning
activities still have problems, especially in terms of the use of interaction design.
This project discussed the development of chat-based online learning interaction
design by implementing an online discussion forum structure. The user goal to be
achieved are learning activities in chat group that can be done easily and
structured. The design interacton development was implemented by goal-directed
design (GDD) approach that focused on achieving user goal, with its
methodologies such as research, modeling, requirements, framework, and
refinement. GDD is a derivative process of user-centered design (UCD), so GDD
has the same design process as UCD with a more specific phases. From the user
goal, a number of end goals are determined, so they are also user goals but in
more specific forms. The end goals were then derived to be usability goals, wich
are effectiveness and learnability, and user experience goal, which is helpful, as
the design goals. The result of the interaction design development is a low-fidelity
prototype as a solution sketch and a high-fidelity as the final design, with the main
features are a chat-based application and forum implementation in its chat
structure. The prototype was tested using usability testing technique to measure
the achievement of usability and user experience goals with appropriate metrics.
Based on the test results of the usability and user experience goals, it was
concluded that the forum and chat focused online learning interaction design had
achieved the user’s goal, i.e. to support online learning activities in group chat in
an easy and structured way.
Kata Kunci: Interaction design, learning, goal, goal-directed design, forum, chat, prototype
